segments.text: I'm just watching this whole scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is quite a sight right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the faucet is fully on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is absolutely gushing out of the sink basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is forming on the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is right in that cold water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's diligently drying a plate, completely focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredible how oblivious she is to the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression doesn't change a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels so surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll ever notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with her calm demeanor is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
